Message:
I only drew this 10 days ago,
but I guess the antiseptics
didn’t work.

I’ll have to dry the house
with more fire next time...

This nearly eternal rain
that people call the “Curse”
is truly my worst nightmare.

The humidity keeps ruining
all my paint pigments
and canvases.

Looks like even this portrait
of my apprentice is gonna
have to be repainted.

Hah... Sorry—
I don’t have any more tools.

Looks like I won’t be able
to see you for a while.
